name: babel-serverless
description: A Node.js starter for the Serverless Framework with async/await and unit test support

scripts.syncFeed: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncFeed -s dev
scripts.syncPostComments: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncPostComments -s dev
scripts.syncCommentSubcomments: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncCommentSubcomments -s dev
scripts.syncCommentReactions: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncCommentReactions -s dev
scripts.syncPostReactions: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncPostReactions -s dev
scripts.syncPostVisibilities: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncPostVisibilities -s dev
scripts.syncCommentVisibilities: SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local --function syncCommentVisibilities -s dev
